title: Villa World shareholders vote to sell the business to Avid Property
text:
Avid Property Group has acquired the ASX-listed residential developer Villa World for $293 million after the Villa World shareholders voted overwhelmingly to approve the purchase on Friday.

Pending a final approval by the NSW Supreme Court, Villa World has been scheduled to cease trading as a public company on October 16.

Villa World CEO Craig Treasure. Dean Whitling

Avid first made its approach to buy the house and land developer in March, making a lower offer of $2.23 a share.

The offer was subsequently revised to $2.345 in July, a price recommended by Villa World's board of directors.

Since the takeover approach, the Villa World share price has seen a resurgence, jumping from pre-takeover lows of below $2 after a pummelling by negative housing downturn sentiments.
description: Pending a final approval by the NSW Supreme Court, Villa World has been scheduled to cease trading as a public company on October 16.
